title: Ryuu no Nemuru Hoshi
sinopse: In the remote galaxy, there's a place called Dragon Planet. Dragons no longer roam about the planet for humans now inhabit it. Not only have the humans endangered the dragon population, they but also brought war. The major conflict is between a group of people ruled by Queen Katea and the group ruled by King Ribushea. The two group had fought for generations, and their current leaders are only continuing the feud. Can Jack and Elena stop this war? (Source: MangaArt)
